env.pagetitle: Kivy: Cross-platform Python Framework for GUI apps Development
About us | Kivy: Cross-platform Python Framework for GUI apps Development

core_developers.name: Mathieu Virbel
core_developers.description:
He became a programming expert from working in IT for years before starting with Kivy.
He's French, and founded Melting Rocks.
On Discord, he's known as @tito.

core_developers.name: Gabriel Pettier
core_developers.description:
He is an Information Systems engineer. He's from France, but currently lives in the Netherlands.
On Discord, he's known as @tshirtman.

core_developers.name: Akshay Arora
core_developers.description:
He is a freelance developer. He is from India.
On Discord, he's known as @quanon.

core_developers.name: Alexander Taylor
core_developers.description:
He is a software engineer, with a little time to make fun graphical interfaces. He lives in the UK.
On Discord, he's known as @inclement.

core_developers.name: Matthew Einhorn
core_developers.description:
He is a developer using Kivy with Python to automate scientific research. He lives in the eastern USA.
On Discord, he's known as @matham.

core_developers.name: Richard Larkin
core_developers.description:
Richard is an educational software developer (B.Sc, Hons) from South Africa. He likes being silly, meditating, music and hugging fluffy things.
On Discord, he's known as @ZenCODE.

core_developers.name: Andre Miras
core_developers.description:
Linux geek and open source addict, he works as a software architect and lives in Spain.
On Discord, he's known as @AndreMiras.

core_developers.name: Mirko Galimberti
core_developers.description:
He is a Full Stack Developer and lives in Italy. Kivy helped him to speed up the App development process while keeping high standards.
On Discord, he's known as @m1sl6.

env.pagetitle: Gallery | Kivy: Cross-platform Python Framework for GUI apps Development

projects.title: Snake by Andy Russo
projects.description: Snake remake with adapted for smartphones controls, that make the game even more exciting. Hearts system makes it even more fun to play! 3 languages localization: English, Chinese, Russian. Have a good game!

projects.title: Morse Code Jam
projects.description: Winner of the Python Discord Code Jam VI! A morse code app, allowing you to decode, encode, train your ear or your morse tapping skills, and even to send and receive messages in morse code! The decoder can even use your microphone to decode morse code from audio on the fly.

projects.title: Chisel
projects.description: Second place for the Python Discord Code Jam VI!.Being an artist in the stone age wasn't easy.Take you chisel and express your primal emotionssmashing a rock to create art.

projects.title: Rex
projects.description: Third place for the Python Discord Code Jam VI!.Ever miss your trusty midnight commander?Wish it time traveled to this age of multitouchand opengl?Explore, manage directories, edit text files and view images.

projects.title: Snu Photo Manager
projects.description: A feature-rich photo manager with photo and video editing capabilities. Sort photos and videos with a database, easily import files from your camera or phone. Edit photos and videos with color adjustments, filters, rotation, cropping, and more. Export your photos for websites, create collages, or convert your videos.

projects.title: Learn Python Offline & IDE
projects.description: An application to learn and experiment with PythonRead and search documentation & tutorials.Includes an editor and offline compiler in the pro version

projects.title: TriFusion
projects.description: Phylogenomic data gathering, processing and visualization for everyone! Detection and exploration of orthologs across multiple species... made easy! Convert, manipulate and export thousands of multiple sequence alignments in a breeze

projects.title: Meccano Rubik's Shrine
projects.description: An electro-mecanical project to solve Rubik's cubesusing Meccano, Arduino, a Raspberry pi and Kivy

projects.title: Métropole de Marseille
projects.description: A custom application to present the Marseille métropole Map with POI selection and basket, custom dynamic object menuRstDocument used to display converted docx documents

projects.title: Mission Pinball Framework
projects.description: A free Python-based pinball framework used to run real pinball machines.Allows builders and programmers to create software for their pinball machines.

projects.title: Digital Stories
projects.description: Collaborative interaction endeavoursusing laser pointers to collectivelydiscover and interact on video games and movies.

projects.title: Nie Nie
projects.description: Casual puzzle/brain teaser with simple gameplayMultiple game modesFriends and global leaderboard!.

projects.title: Gravity Ride
projects.description: Arcade spaceship simulatorUse gravity in travel through the space94 unique challenging levels

projects.title: KOGNITIVO - Brain Training
projects.description: Analyse your cognitive activityon the basis of some short games!See your daily and weekly productivity in graphs

projects.title: Barly
projects.description: Decipher all of those crazy names and tell you which beers you’ll be glad you tried.Beers recommendation based on your personal taste!

projects.title: Simple Peinture
projects.description: Kid drawing applicationUndo system, one touch to change tool.Multitouch supported!

projects.title: Tangible Media
projects.description: Explore data with objectCombine them for advanced visualisation.Single or collaborative mode!

projects.title: PyDelhi Conf 2017
projects.description: Official App for PyDelhi Conf 2017Used on 18-19 March 2017

projects.title: Rocket Kite
projects.description: Fly your rocket kite among the planetsUse gravity to your advantage, collect all checkpointsExperience space flight in this colorful simulator

projects.title: Particle Panda
projects.description: Create particle effect for particle systemsused in Starling, Kivy and Cocos2dWorking on Desktop and mobile.

projects.title: Yeco
projects.description: Yeco is a multi touch controller for Ableton LiveAvailable for Windows and macOS

projects.title: ProcessCraft
projects.description: Commercial application for Business Process ModelingRunning on iOS, Android, and others desktop OS

projects.title: Deflectouch
projects.description: Multitouch game, first place of the Kivy Contest #1

projects.title: FishLife
projects.description: Multitouch game, second place of the Kivy Contest #1

projects.title: memoryKivy
projects.description: Multitouch game, third place of the Kivy Contest #1

projects.title: TicTacTouch
projects.description: Multitouch screen used for control a PLC hardware machine.

projects.description: Interactive tablet menu with wine, beer, cocktail...Clean design with cool touch interaction, on android !

projects.title: Kaleidoscope
projects.description: Educational project using 4 tablets and 1 table with projection.Augmented knowledge table, that can be shared across tablet.

projects.title: Touch Live

projects.title: Epidemy: The Outbreak
projects.description: Board-like strategy free gameResearch and use various methods to defeat the epidemy7 game modes, 4 infections, 27 methods, 13 countries

projects.title: Sideband
projects.description: A messaging application for Reticulum mesh network software. Allows communication using LoRA, internet and other interfaces.
